translated: It is straight and free of crookedness. It is the path of the sameness of suchness, the unobstructed path. Having entered it, they will cut through the thickets of views, untie all the knots, and dispel the darkness.

original: sred pa'i mngon par zhen pa rnams spang pa dang / 'du 'phrod rnams spang pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur lags /

translated: Therefore, you have become devoted to this profound Dharma with fervent longing, and with vast intention you have given rise to great compassion in order to bring sentient beings to full maturity. It is excellent that you have asked the Tathagata about this.‚Äù

translated: Excellent! Listen well and keep this in mind! I will now explain to you how bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas accomplish the qualities and how they progress toward unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

translated: the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who dons the great armor for the sake of unsurpassed perfect enlightenment should don the great armor in order to gather in sentient beings.

analyzed: sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //

original: sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i dngos po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i dngos po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //
translated: In order to generate the thought that is endowed with the means of benefiting sentient beings, one should don the great armor.

original: sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad kyi gnyen po bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad kyi gnyen po bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //

original: yon tan chen po mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: yon tan chen po mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //
translated: In order to be skilled in accomplishing great qualities, one should don the great armor.

analyzed: bla na med pa'i ye shes legs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //
translated: In order to perfectly complete unsurpassed wisdom, one should don the great armor.

analyzed: sems can rnams 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o //

analyzed: mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid ma yin pa dang yang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur /
translated: They are not associated with characteristics or non-characteristics.

original: chos thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: chos thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: They are not associated with any phenomena.

original: mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshungs par ldan par mi 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: They are not non-associated.

original: 'ching ba med pa dang / grol ba med pa dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dag gis shes par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'ching ba med pa dang / grol ba med pa dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dag gis shes par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: They are not to be known through bondage, liberation, enumeration, or examples.

original: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni /
translated: In this way, all phenomena

original: bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are beyond enumeration.

original: de lta bu'i go cha dang ldan pa de dag ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i go cha dang ldan pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who possess such armor

original: chos thams cad du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs te /
analyzed: chos thams cad du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs te /
translated: do not observe any views of all phenomena.

original: gzugs su lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs su lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not observe views of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not observe the view of feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: tha na chos cung zad tsam du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tha na chos cung zad tsam du lta ba yang dag par mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not observe the view of even the slightest phenomenon.

original: de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni /üîΩchos thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni / chos thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang ma yin /
translated: In that way, those who have donned such armorüîΩare not conjoined with any phenomenon.

original: mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin no //üîΩgzugs dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin no // gzugs dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin /
translated: They are not disjoined from any phenomenon.üîΩThey are not conjoined with form.

original: mtshungs par mi ldan @129b pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs par mi ldan @129b pa yang ma yin no //
translated: They are not disjoined from form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin /
translated: They are not conjoined with feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin te; chos thams cad kyi mtshungs par ldan pa dang / mtshungs par mi ldan pa de dag thag bsrings pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs par mi ldan pa yang ma yin te; chos thams cad kyi mtshungs par ldan pa dang / mtshungs par mi ldan pa de dag thag bsrings pa yin no //
translated: They are not disjoined from feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness. They are far removed from the conjoining and disjoining of all phenomena.

original: de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag la ni /
translated: In that way, those who have donned such armor

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med de /
translated: There is no activity.

original: byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no agent.

original: mtshan ma yang med de /
analyzed: mtshan ma yang med de /
translated: There are no signs.

original: mtshan ma nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because signs themselves do not exist.

original: gnas kyi mtshan ma med pa /üîΩ'dus pa'i mtshan ma med pa /
analyzed: gnas kyi mtshan ma med pa / 'dus pa'i mtshan ma med pa /
translated: There are no signs of a location.üîΩThere are no signs of a collection.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa /
translated: There is no conceptualization.

original: g-yo ba med pa /
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa /
translated: There is no movement.

original: dmigs pa med pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa /
translated: There is no objective support.

original: ngo bo nyid du lta ba med pa ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid du lta ba med pa ste /
translated: There is no view of an intrinsic nature.

original: go cha bgos pa nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: go cha bgos pa nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: Even the donning of armor is unobservable.

original: de bzhin du go cha bgos pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du go cha bgos pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: In the same way, one does not see the donning of armor.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha yang dag par bgos pa na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams go cha yang dag par bgos pa na /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings don the armor,

original: gang gis go cha bgos pa dang / gang du go cha bgos pa dang / gang las go cha bgos pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / bdag gis go cha bgos pa dang / bdag gis go cha bgos par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /
analyzed: gang gis go cha bgos pa dang / gang du go cha bgos pa dang / gang las go cha bgos pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / bdag gis go cha bgos pa dang / bdag gis go cha bgos par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /
translated: They do not see who dons the armor, where the armor is donned, or from where the armor is donned.

original: 'dir go cha bgos pa dang / gzhan du go cha bgos pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / go cha de lta bu @130a *//
analyzed: 'dir go cha bgos pa dang / gzhan du go cha bgos pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / go cha de lta bu @130a *//
translated: They do not see that they don the armor, nor do they see that they don the armor here or elsewhere.

original: bgos pa'i sems can yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: bgos pa'i sems can yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: They do not see any beings who don such armor.

original: chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all phenomena are beyond formation and do not exist.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de lta bu bgos pa de dag ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who don such armor

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha bgos pa yin pas lus kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha bgos pa yin pas lus kyang mi dmigs /
translated: do not apprehend a body,

original: ngag kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: ngag kyang mi dmigs /
translated: do not apprehend speech,

original: yid kyang mi dmigs /
analyzed: yid kyang mi dmigs /
translated: and do not apprehend mind.

original: dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rab tu spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rab tu spangs pa yin no //
translated: Because it is non-apprehensible, it is the relinquishment of conceptualization.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gal te chos cung zad tsam la gnas par gyur tam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gal te chos cung zad tsam la gnas par gyur tam /
translated: If bodhisattva great beings were to stand in some dharma,

original: gal te chos cung zad tsam la dmigs nas go cha bgos sam /üîΩgo cha bgo'am /
analyzed: gal te chos cung zad tsam la dmigs nas go cha bgos sam / go cha bgo'am /
translated: or if they were to don the armor having observed some dharma,üîΩor if they were to don the armor,

original: go cha bgo bar 'gyur ba de dag ni /
analyzed: go cha bgo bar 'gyur ba de dag ni /
translated: or if they were to don the armor in the future,

original: go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya ste /
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya ste /
translated: then they would not be said to have donned the great armor.

original: gal te sems can de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te sems can de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur na /
translated: If they were to transcend those sentient beings,

original: gdod bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod par bya'o //üîΩbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /üîΩsems can 'ga' tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin /
analyzed: gdod bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod par bya'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni / sems can 'ga' tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin /
translated: then they would be said to have donned the great armor of the inconceivable.üîΩBodhisattva great beingsüîΩdo not don the great armor for the sake of some sentient beings.

original: bskal pa gcig gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin /
analyzed: bskal pa gcig gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin /
translated: They do not don the great armor for the sake of the sentient beings of a single eon.

original: bskal pa brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya @130b stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bskal pa brgya stong dang / bskal pa bye ba brgya @130b stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sems can tsam gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin gyi /
translated: They do not don the great armor for the sake of sentient beings in a hundred or a thousand eons, or a hundred thousand eons, or a billion eons.

original: bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas de phyir go cha chen po tshad med pa bgos pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can gyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas de phyir go cha chen po tshad med pa bgos pa zhes bya'o //
translated: They don the great armor for the sake of sentient beings in countless, immeasurable eons. Therefore, they are called those who don the immeasurable great armor.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings,

original: go cha yang dag par bgos pa na /
analyzed: go cha yang dag par bgos pa na /
translated: when they don the armor correctly,

original: sems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'i go cha gyon par byed de /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes la mi gnas pa'i go cha gyon par byed de /
translated: don the armor without abiding in the perception of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi 'du shes mi bskyed pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi 'du shes spang ba'i go cha dang / bdag gi 'du shes bzlog pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes mi bskyed pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi 'du shes spang ba'i go cha dang / bdag gi 'du shes bzlog pa'i go cha dang / sems can gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / bdag gi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i go cha dang /
translated: They don the armor that does not produce the perception of sentient beings, the armor that abandons the perception of sentient beings, the armor that turns back the perception of self, the armor that knows the intrinsic nature of sentient beings, the armor that knows the intrinsic nature of self,

original: 'du shes dang tshor ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad la byed pa 'du shes med par shes pa'i go cha dang / mtshan ma'i go cha dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang /üîΩchos thams cad skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi bye brag gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / bye brag gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid shes @131a *//
analyzed: 'du shes dang tshor ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad la byed pa 'du shes med par shes pa'i go cha dang / mtshan ma'i go cha dang / mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang / smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / 'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi bye brag gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / bye brag gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid shes @131a *//
translated: the armor of transcending perception and sensation, the armor of knowing that all phenomena are devoid of action and perception, the armor of the characteristics of signlessness, the armor of the characteristics of wishlessness,üîΩthe armor of knowing the characteristics of the nonarising of all phenomena, the armor of knowing the characteristics of noncessation, the armor of knowing the characteristics of the specific natures of all phenomena, the armor of knowing the characteristics of the absence of specific natures,

original: pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha gyon par byed do; ;blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: pa'i go cha dang / chos thams cad kyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid shes pa'i go cha dang / dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi go cha gyon par byed do; ;blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: the armor of knowing the characteristics of the entities of all phenomena, and the armor of the characteristics of nonentity.üîΩ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: gal te dngos po la gnas nas go cha gyon par byed la go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gal te dngos po la gnas nas go cha gyon par byed la go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya ste /
translated: If one were to don armor while abiding in entities, it would be called donning the great armor.

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas

original: dngos po la mi gnas par ye shes chen po yongs su tshol ba yin pas de phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la mi gnas par ye shes chen po yongs su tshol ba yin pas de phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: do not abide in entities but seek great wisdom. Therefore, it is called donning the great armor.

original: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then at that time, the BhagavƒÅn spoke in verse:

original: bskal pa stong phrag tshad med du //
analyzed: bskal pa stong phrag tshad med du //
translated: For countless thousands of eons,

original: go cha dpag med bgos nas su //üîΩsems can dag ni thams cad kun //
analyzed: go cha dpag med bgos nas su // sems can dag ni thams cad kun //
translated: having donned the immeasurable armor,üîΩthey liberate all sentient beings

original: sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed //
translated: from all sufferings.

original: de lta'i go cha che bgos pa //üîΩbdud dang bdud kyi mngags pa dang // bdud kyi las rnams byed pa dag /
analyzed: de lta'i go cha che bgos pa // bdud dang bdud kyi mngags pa dang // bdud kyi las rnams byed pa dag /
translated: Those who don such a great armorüîΩare not seen by MƒÅra, MƒÅra's emissaries,

original: mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or those who perform MƒÅra's deeds.

original: de las gzhan pa'i sems can gang //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i sems can gang //
translated: Other than that, whatever sentient beings

original: lta ba'i thibs por zhugs pa dag /
analyzed: lta ba'i thibs por zhugs pa dag /
translated: have entered the thicket of views,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab go cha 'di //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab go cha 'di //
translated: This armor is inconceivable.

original: des kyang thob par 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: des kyang thob par 'gyur ma yin //
translated: Even they will not attain it.

original: gzugs med cing ni kha dog med //
analyzed: gzugs med cing ni kha dog med //
translated: It is formless and without color,

original: bstan du med cing ltos med pa //
analyzed: bstan du med cing ltos med pa //
translated: Unteachable and independent.

original: go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
analyzed: go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
translated: This inconceivable armor

original: de phyir mig gis blta bya min //
analyzed: de phyir mig gis blta bya min //
translated: Is therefore not to be seen with the eyes.üîΩWithout name, without sign,

original: ming med mtshan ma med pa dang // @131b mtshan ma thams cad spangs pas na //
analyzed: ming med mtshan ma med pa dang // @131b mtshan ma thams cad spangs pas na //
translated: Abandoning all signs,

original: go cha bgos pa dpag tu med //
analyzed: go cha bgos pa dpag tu med //
translated: The donning of this armor is immeasurable.

original: de phyir phan tshun mthong ba med //
analyzed: de phyir phan tshun mthong ba med //
translated: Therefore, they do not see each other.

original: gal te mda' ni ri rab tshad //
analyzed: gal te mda' ni ri rab tshad //
translated: If an arrow the size of Mount Meru

original: shin tu rnon po 'phangs na yang //
analyzed: shin tu rnon po 'phangs na yang //

original: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas //

original: mda' ni rang nyid chags par 'gyur //
analyzed: mda' ni rang nyid chags par 'gyur //
translated: The arrow would be stopped in its tracks.

original: 'jig rten bdud ni ji snyed pas //
analyzed: 'jig rten bdud ni ji snyed pas //

original: ri rab tshad kyi mda' rnams kyis //

translated: With arrows the size of Mount Meru,

original: go cha chen po bgos pa la; ;dus gcig 'ongs te 'phangs na yang //
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos pa la; ;dus gcig 'ongs te 'phangs na yang //
translated: If they were to come at once and shoot

original: go cha chen po bgos pa yi //
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos pa yi //
translated: The one who dons the great armor,

original: spu nyag gcig ni nyams mi 'gyur //
analyzed: spu nyag gcig ni nyams mi 'gyur //
translated: Not a single hair of the oneüîΩWho dons the great armor will be harmed.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas //
translated: Because of donning the inconceivable armor,

original: gang yang phan byed gzhig mi nus //
analyzed: gang yang phan byed gzhig mi nus //

original: de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams //
analyzed: de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams //

analyzed: lus dang sems ni 'gyur ba med //
translated: Are neither physically nor mentally agitated.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos la //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos la //
translated: They are clad in the inconceivable armor;üîΩWho can move or shake them?

analyzed: su zhig bsgul zhing g-yo bar nus; ;sems bskyed thang gcig tsam gyis kyang //
translated: Even for just a single instant of thought,

original: bdud ni mang po pham byed pa //
analyzed: bdud ni mang po pham byed pa //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bsam mi khyab //

original: bdud dpung dag ni 'jil bar byed //
analyzed: bdud dpung dag ni 'jil bar byed //

original: de lta'i go cha che bgos pa //
analyzed: de lta'i go cha che bgos pa //

original: nam yang g-yo bar mi 'gyur bas //
analyzed: nam yang g-yo bar mi 'gyur bas //

original: sems can dag ni thams cad kyis //
analyzed: sems can dag ni thams cad kyis //

original: mthong bar nus pa gang yang med //
analyzed: mthong bar nus pa gang yang med //

analyzed: sems can dag ni thams cad kyis // go cha mtshan nyid mi shes pas // de phyir sems can thams cad kyis //

analyzed: mig gis mthong bar mi nus so //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed cing //

analyzed: chos @132a *// rnams thams cad shes pas ni //

original: rdo rje mchog dang 'dra bas na //
analyzed: rdo rje mchog dang 'dra bas na //

original: de ni legs par go bgos yin //
analyzed: de ni legs par go bgos yin //
translated: This is the proper donning of armor.

original: chos rnams thams cad mi len zhing //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad mi len zhing //
translated: ‚ÄúNot grasping at any phenomena,

original: sems can thams cad skyob byed pas //
analyzed: sems can thams cad skyob byed pas //

analyzed: sangs rgyas chos kyi rjes 'brang phyir //

original: de ni legs par go bgos yin //
analyzed: de ni legs par go bgos yin //

original: go char 'dzin pa med par ni //
analyzed: go char 'dzin pa med par ni //
translated: ‚ÄúNot grasping at the donning of armor,

original: chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'brang ba //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'brang ba //
translated: Following all phenomena,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab go bgos pas //

analyzed: 'jig rten dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal can dang / mu stegs can mngon par yid ches pa /

original: theg pa 'di'i ming thos par yang mi 'dod na; theg pa 'di la bzhon par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: theg pa 'di'i ming thos par yang mi 'dod na; theg pa 'di la bzhon par bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //

original: gal te sems can gang la la zhig bsam gyis khyab pa'i spyod yul la rnam par rtsen cing theg pa 'di la bzhon par byed na /
analyzed: gal te sems can gang la la zhig bsam gyis khyab pa'i spyod yul la rnam par rtsen cing theg pa 'di la bzhon par byed na /

analyzed: smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro // blo gros mtha' yas /

original: theg pa 'di ni /
analyzed: theg pa 'di ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThis vehicle, O Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´, is infinite.

original: mtha' med de /
analyzed: mtha' med de /

analyzed: sngon dang / dbus dang / tha ma'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
translated: The beginning, middle, and end cannot be realized.

original: theg pa 'di ni /
analyzed: theg pa 'di ni /
translated: This vehicle

original: mtha' yongs su chad pa yin te /
analyzed: mtha' yongs su chad pa yin te /

original: mtha' mi dmigs pas mtha' dpag tu med do //
analyzed: mtha' mi dmigs pas mtha' dpag tu med do //

original: theg pa 'di'i mtha' ni /
analyzed: theg pa 'di'i mtha' ni /

original: tshad med pa'i mtha' yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i mtha' yin no //
translated: is the immeasurable end.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: Anantamati,

original: theg pa 'di la @135b ni; dpag tu med pas dbus kyi mtha' yang med la /
analyzed: theg pa 'di la @135b ni; dpag tu med pas dbus kyi mtha' yang med la /

analyzed: spang bar bya ba'i mtha' cung zad tsam yang yod pa ma yin no //

original: de la mtha' spangs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la mtha' spangs pa zhes bya ba ni /

original: mtha' zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med pas mtha' spangs pa zhes bshad do //
analyzed: mtha' zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med pas mtha' spangs pa zhes bshad do //

analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtha' la mtha' spangs pa zhes bshad de /
translated: The end of nonconceptuality is explained as the abandonment of the end,üîΩand that is called the abandonment of the end of this vehicle.

analyzed: de ni / theg pa 'di'i mtha' spangs pa zhes bya'o; ;mtha' yod pa ma yin pas dbus kyi mtha' zhes bya'o //
translated: Because there is no end, it is called the middle end.

original: mtha' yod pa ma yin pas mtha'i mtha' zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' yod pa ma yin pas mtha'i mtha' zhes bya'o //
translated: Because there is no end, it is called the end of the end.

original: mtha' yod pa ma yin bas mtha' zhes bshad do //
analyzed: mtha' yod pa ma yin bas mtha' zhes bshad do //
translated: Since it is not a limit, it is called a limit.

original: mtha' de la ni /
analyzed: mtha' de la ni /

original: mtha' dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha' dmigs su med do //

original: dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha'i mtha' dang / dbus kyi mtha' dang / mtha' med pas rgyun mi chad par mtha'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha'i mtha' dang / dbus kyi mtha' dang / mtha' med pas rgyun mi chad par mtha'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is not observed, the limit of the limit, the limit of the middle, and the limit of the absence of limits are uninterruptedly entered through the door of the limit.

original: mtha'i sgor zhugs pa'i phyir theg pa 'di las yang dag par 'das pa yin yang yang dag par 'das pa nyid dmigs su med do //
analyzed: mtha'i sgor zhugs pa'i phyir theg pa 'di las yang dag par 'das pa yin yang yang dag par 'das pa nyid dmigs su med do //
translated: Since it is entered through the door of the limit, it transcends this vehicle, yet the transcendence itself is not observed.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: mtha' nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtha' nyid gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa'o //

original: tshig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir mtha' nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir mtha' nyid ma yin no //
translated: Since it is engaged in words, it is not a limit.

original: des rtag pa'i mtha' spangs na mtha'i mtha' yang yod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: des rtag pa'i mtha' spangs na mtha'i mtha' yang yod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If one abandons the limit of permanence, the limit of the limit will not exist either,

original: mtha' de'i mtshan nyid mtha' med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' de'i mtshan nyid mtha' med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the characteristic of that limit is the absence of limits.

original: de la mtha' zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la mtha' zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In this regard, what is called a limit

analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa chad pa'i phyir mtha' @136a *//
translated: Because it is free from conceptualization and the cessation of conceptualization,

original: las yang dag par 'das shing chad pa dang / rtag pa rab tu spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: las yang dag par 'das shing chad pa dang / rtag pa rab tu spangs pa yin no //
translated: it transcends the extremes and is free from eternalism and nihilism.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bcas pa de ni /
analyzed: gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bcas pa de ni /

original: mtha'i sgo la gnas par byed kyi /
analyzed: mtha'i sgo la gnas par byed kyi /

original: gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba med pa de dag ni /

original: mtha'i sgo la mngon par zhen par mi byed do //
analyzed: mtha'i sgo la mngon par zhen par mi byed do //

original: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' las yang dag par 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' las yang dag par 'das pa yin no //
translated: Because they do not cling, they transcend the extremes of eternalism and nihilism.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: Anantamati,

original: chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' de dag ni /
analyzed: chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' de dag ni /
translated: these extremes of eternalism and nihilism

original: yang dag par yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yang dag par yod pa ma yin gyi /

original: slu ba'i tshig srid pa gsum po dag na mtha' rnam pa gnyis su rnam par rtog par byed pa yin pas /
analyzed: slu ba'i tshig srid pa gsum po dag na mtha' rnam pa gnyis su rnam par rtog par byed pa yin pas /
translated: They are deceptive words that cause one to conceptualize the two extremes within the three realms of existence.

original: mtha' gnyis po de dag gis yongs su ma bsdus shing mtshungs par ldan par ma gyur na /üîΩyang dag par 'das shing 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong pa'i phyir mtha' gnyis kyi sgo la mngon par zhen par mi byed do //
analyzed: mtha' gnyis po de dag gis yongs su ma bsdus shing mtshungs par ldan par ma gyur na / yang dag par 'das shing 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong pa'i phyir mtha' gnyis kyi sgo la mngon par zhen par mi byed do //
translated: If they are not included in these two extremes, and if they are not associated with them,

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: then they transcend them correctly and do not cling to the doors of the two extremes in order to abandon the view of the transitory collection.üîΩ‚ÄúBh≈´timat,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba da dung ma spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba da dung ma spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
translated: those bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas who have not yet abandoned the view of the transitory collection

original: go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa zhes mi bya ste /
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa zhes mi bya ste /
translated: are not called ‚Äòthose who have donned the great armor and mounted the Great Vehicle.‚Äô

original: mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen par gyur pas /
analyzed: mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen par gyur pas /
translated: Because they cling to those doors of the extremes,

original: gal te mtha' spong bar 'dod par gyur @136b na yang mtha' spong ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par rtog par byed do //
analyzed: gal te mtha' spong bar 'dod par gyur @136b na yang mtha' spong ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed pas sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par rtog par byed do //

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba spangs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /

analyzed: go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Once they have donned the great armor, they are said to have mounted the Great Vehicle.

original: mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen pa med pas mtha' gnyis po dag las yang dag par 'das nas rab tu bde ba'i theg pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha'i sgo de dag la mngon par zhen pa med pas mtha' gnyis po dag las yang dag par 'das nas rab tu bde ba'i theg pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since they are not attached to those extreme views, they transcend the two extremes and proceed to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by means of the vehicle of complete happiness.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúDeep Thinking,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang blo gros chen po'i stobs kyis mtha'i chos la gnas pa thams cad mi spong mi gzhig pa'i thabs la mkhas pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang blo gros chen po'i stobs kyis mtha'i chos la gnas pa thams cad mi spong mi gzhig pa'i thabs la mkhas pas /

original: zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yongs su bsdus nas mtshan ma med pa la mngon par bsgrubs te mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du gyur na /
analyzed: zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong yongs su bsdus nas mtshan ma med pa la mngon par bsgrubs te mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du gyur na /

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos kyi snang ba sbyin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos kyi snang ba sbyin par 'gyur la /

original: chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i dbang gis mtha' thams cad rab tu spong zhing /
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i dbang gis mtha' thams cad rab tu spong zhing /
translated: By the power of having obtained the light of the Dharma, they will completely abandon all extremes.

original: mtha' spong ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med pas mtha' cung zad tsam yang mtha'i sgo de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am /
analyzed: mtha' spong ba de dag la yang mngon par zhen pa med pas mtha' cung zad tsam yang mtha'i sgo de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'am /
translated: Since they are not attached to the refutation of extremes, they are not in the slightest way associated with those extremes or with the doors of those extremes.

original: mtshungs par mi ldan pa'am /üîΩyid la byed pa'am /
analyzed: mtshungs par mi ldan pa'am / yid la byed pa'am /
translated: Since they are not attached to the abandonment of extremes, they are not in the slightest way associated with or dissociated from those doors of extremes.

original: yid la @137a *//
analyzed: yid la @137a *//
translated: They do not pay attention to or not pay attention to anything.

original: mi byed pa yang med par chos thams cad la thabs mkhas pas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong de la rab tu gnas shing chos kyi snang ba chen po dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi byed pa yang med par chos thams cad la thabs mkhas pas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong de la rab tu gnas shing chos kyi snang ba chen po dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By means of skillful means with regard to all phenomena, they abide in ≈õamatha and vipa≈õyanƒÅ and attain the great, immeasurable illumination of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i phyir mun nag dang / spu zing zhes byed pa'i 'jigs pa dag yongs su spangs nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang / tshangs pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa dang / sengge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas sems can rnams la 'di skad du /
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba thob pa'i phyir mun nag dang / spu zing zhes byed pa'i 'jigs pa dag yongs su spangs nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba dang / tshangs pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa dang / sengge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas sems can rnams la 'di skad du /
translated: Having attained the illumination of the Dharma, they abandon the fears of darkness and the hairs standing on end. They raise the great victory banner of the Dharma, emit the great sound of BrahmƒÅ, and roar the great lion‚Äôs roar. They say to sentient beings:üîΩ‚ÄúFriends, do not be afraid!

original: kye khyed rnams myur du 'dir shog la theg pa chen po rab tu bde pa'i theg pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba chen po'i theg pa dang / rab tu gzhol ba chen po'i theg pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba rab tu ston la /
analyzed: kye khyed rnams myur du 'dir shog la theg pa chen po rab tu bde pa'i theg pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba chen po'i theg pa dang / rab tu gzhol ba chen po'i theg pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba rab tu ston la /
translated: ‚ÄúO, you all, quickly come here! Having entered into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by means of this vehicle of the Great Vehicle, the vehicle of great bliss, the vehicle of the great charioteer, and the vehicle of great descent, you should teach the light of the Dharma to sentient beings.

original: chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis sems can rnams la go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po bzhon pa la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis sems can rnams la go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po bzhon pa la dgod par bya'o //
translated: By the power of the light of the Dharma, you should don the great armor for sentient beings and establish them in the vehicle of the Great Vehicle.‚Äù

original: zhes sgrog par byed do //
analyzed: zhes sgrog par byed do //
translated: They proclaim this.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúO, Ajita!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis theg pa chen po 'di dang / go cha chen po 'di la ser sna mi bskyed par sems can rnams la byang chub tu sems @137b bskyed de go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis theg pa chen po 'di dang / go cha chen po 'di la ser sna mi bskyed par sems can rnams la byang chub tu sems @137b bskyed de go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas should not be stingy with this Great Vehicle and this great armor, but should generate the mind of enlightenment in sentient beings. Having donned this armor, they should make the aspiration prayer, 'May they mount this Great Vehicle.'

original: theg pa chen po 'di dang / go cha chen po 'di la ser sna mi bya bar sems can rnams la brgyud cing spel bar bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di dang / go cha chen po 'di la ser sna mi bya bar sems can rnams la brgyud cing spel bar bya'o //
translated: They should not be stingy with this Great Vehicle and this great armor, but should transmit and spread it to sentient beings.

original: gzhan yang sems can rnams go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon te nges par 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang sems can rnams go cha 'di bgos nas theg pa chen po 'di la zhon te nges par 'byung bar gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, they should make the aspiration prayer, 'Having donned this armor, may sentient beings mount this Great Vehicle and attain definitive release.'

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang yongs su sdud par byed la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang yongs su sdud par byed la /
translated: When bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas abide in such practices, they gather the pure buddha-fields.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa yang sdud par gyur bas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa yang sdud par gyur bas /
translated: It is the source of the qualities of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas.

original: yon tan gyi rgya mtsho chen po dpag tu med pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyi rgya mtsho chen po dpag tu med pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, with this great, immeasurable ocean of qualities, one should strive for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: blo gros mtha' yas; theg pa chen po 'di ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas tshu rol gyi 'gram dang / pha rol gyi 'gram dmigs su med mong gyi /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas; theg pa chen po 'di ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pas tshu rol gyi 'gram dang / pha rol gyi 'gram dmigs su med mong gyi /
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati, this Great Vehicle is equal to the realm of phenomena, and so the near shore and the far shore cannot be apprehended.

original: 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis sems can thams cad bteg ste 'di nas chos kyi dbyings su phyin par byed pas gnas pa med pas rjes su mthun pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su mthun pa dang / go @138a *//
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi ngang gis sems can thams cad bteg ste 'di nas chos kyi dbyings su phyin par byed pas gnas pa med pas rjes su mthun pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su mthun pa dang / go @138a *//
translated: Nevertheless, it naturally lifts up all beings and carries them from here to the realm of phenomena, and so it is without location, and thus it is in accord with the realm of phenomena and in accord with the Dharma.

original: cha'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cha'i rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is in accord with the Dharma.

original: gang gis theg pa chen po'i chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang gis theg pa chen po'i chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa 'di la nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who practice earnestly in this Great Vehicle, which is equal to the realm of phenomena,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
translated: are truly engaged in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / chos kyi dbyings ni /

analyzed: mngon par zhen cing 'dzin pa med pas rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa yang yongs su spong bar byed do //
translated: Since they do not cling to or grasp at anything, they abandon both concepts and non-concepts.

original: lam 'di la ni /
analyzed: lam 'di la ni /
translated: On this path

original: snying brtse ba yang med /üîΩmngon par 'du byed pa yang med /üîΩspro 'dogs pa yang med /
analyzed: snying brtse ba yang med / mngon par 'du byed pa yang med / spro 'dogs pa yang med /
translated: there is no compassion,üîΩno formation,üîΩno encouragement,

original: blang zhing dor ba yang @144a *//
analyzed: blang zhing dor ba yang @144a *//
translated: no acceptance or rejection,

original: med do; ;mnyam pa nyid kyi lam yang dag pa la gnas pa ni /
analyzed: med do; ;mnyam pa nyid kyi lam yang dag pa la gnas pa ni /
translated: and no abiding in the path of sameness.

original: 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnam par rtog par mi byed pas /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnam par rtog par mi byed pas /
translated: Since they do not conceptualize the past, present, or future,

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang / bag la nyal ji snyed pa dag ma lus par khong du chud cing /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang / bag la nyal ji snyed pa dag ma lus par khong du chud cing /
translated: They are called ‚Äòthose who abide on the right path‚Äô because they completely understand all conceptual thoughts and latent tendencies,

original: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i don la rab tu gnas par byed pas lam yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o //üîΩblo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyin ci ma log pa'i don la rab tu gnas par byed pas lam yang dag pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o // blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: and because they abide in the unmistaken meaning of the sameness of all phenomena.üîΩ‚ÄúBh≈´timat,

original: lam dang / rnam par dag pa'i lam gang zhe na /
analyzed: lam dang / rnam par dag pa'i lam gang zhe na /
translated: what is the path and the pure path?

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is the noble eightfold path.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang // yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang // yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
translated: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,

original: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to /
translated: and right concentration.

original: yang dag pa'i lta bas ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta bas ni /
translated: ‚ÄúRight view

original: 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong zhing lta bar gyur pa'i sbyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pas lta ba thams cad gnas pa dang / dus thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag pa yang thob par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong zhing lta bar gyur pa'i sbyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pas lta ba thams cad gnas pa dang / dus thams cad du shin tu rnam par dag pa yang thob par 'gyur la /
translated: They abandon the view of the transitory collection and completely transcend all objects of the view. They attain the state of all views and the complete purity of all times.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang / khyad par du rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pas rnam par rtog pa dang / khyad par du rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rnam par rtog pa yang med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang / khyad par du rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pas rnam par rtog pa dang / khyad par du rnam par rtog pa dang / kun tu rnam par rtog pa yang med par 'gyur ro //
translated: They realize all conceptual thoughts, specific conceptual thoughts, and continuous conceptual thoughts, and thus they are free from conceptual thoughts, specific conceptual thoughts, and continuous conceptual thoughts.

original: log par rtog pa la mi @144b gnas shing log par rtog pa rab tu spangs pas /
analyzed: log par rtog pa la mi @144b gnas shing log par rtog pa rab tu spangs pas /
translated: They do not dwell on false thoughts and completely abandon false thoughts.

original: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'du shes kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'i 'du shes kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They attain right livelihood and the perception of right livelihood.

original: 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa mthong zhing 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa la gnas pas lus kyi las rnam par dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam par dag pa mthong zhing yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa mthong zhing 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa la gnas pas lus kyi las rnam par dag pa dang / ngag gi las rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi las rnam par dag pa mthong zhing yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Seeing the purity of livelihood and abiding in the purity of livelihood, they see the purity of physical, verbal, and mental actions and abide in right action.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i ngag gi las kyis ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i ngag gi las kyis ni /
translated: Through the verbal action of right view,

original: tshig dang / smra ba mang po dag rab tu shes shing mthong bas yang dag pa'i ngag la gnas nas mi mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: tshig dang / smra ba mang po dag rab tu shes shing mthong bas yang dag pa'i ngag la gnas nas mi mthun pa'i phyogs yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: they understand and see speech and many expressions, and abiding in right speech, they purify the opposing side.

original: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i lta bas ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i lta bas ni /
translated: Through the view of right effort,

original: brtson 'grus rab tu sdud cing /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rab tu sdud cing /
translated: they gather diligence

original: yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas par byed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus la gnas par byed do //
translated: and abide in right effort.üîΩThrough the mindfulness of right view,

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pas ni; rjes su dran pa yang med /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dran pas ni; rjes su dran pa yang med /
translated: they have no recollection

original: yid la byed pa yang med /
analyzed: yid la byed pa yang med /
translated: and no mental activity.

original: 'dzin pa yang med par rnam par dag pa'i dran pas yang dag pa'i dran pa la gnas par byed do //
analyzed: 'dzin pa yang med par rnam par dag pa'i dran pas yang dag pa'i dran pa la gnas par byed do //
translated: Without grasping, they abide in right mindfulness through pure mindfulness.

original: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni /
translated: Through the samƒÅdhi of right view,

original: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa med par ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu sbyangs nas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par byed do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa med par ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu sbyangs nas yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par byed do //
translated: they purify the view of samƒÅdhi without abiding in samƒÅdhi and abide in right samƒÅdhi.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar mthong ba'i tshe thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba thob pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur @145a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar mthong ba'i tshe thams cad du rnam par dag pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba thob pas shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur @145a *//
translated: when bodhisattva great beings see in this way, they attain the right view of complete purity in all ways and abide in the path of complete purity.

original: te; shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lam 'di ni /üîΩskyes bu dam pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya ba /üîΩblo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bkur bar bya ba /
analyzed: te; shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lam 'di ni / skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya ba / blo dang ldan pa rnams kyis bkur bar bya ba /
translated: This path of complete purityüîΩis to be cultivated by holy beings,üîΩto be honored by the wise,

original: 'phags pa rnams dga' bar byed pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams dga' bar byed pa /
translated: and to delight the noble ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin pas bdud dang / bdud kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi mngag pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'i gnas ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa yin pas bdud dang / bdud kyi 'khor dang / bdud kyi mngag pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'i gnas ma yin no //
translated: Since it is praised by the TathƒÅgatas, it is not a place that can be reached by any of the mƒÅras, the retinue of mƒÅras, the messengers of mƒÅras, or the gods of the mƒÅra class.

original: phyi rol pa'i lam la sred cing mngon par zhen pa thams cad dang / rtsod pa'i smra ba la gnas pa dang / lha ba'i thibs por zhugs pa dang / lam ma yin par song ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la sogs pas bgrod par bya ba'i phyir spyod yul yang ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol pa'i lam la sred cing mngon par zhen pa thams cad dang / rtsod pa'i smra ba la gnas pa dang / lha ba'i thibs por zhugs pa dang / lam ma yin par song ba dang / 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la sogs pas bgrod par bya ba'i phyir spyod yul yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not a domain that can be reached by those who crave and cling to the paths of non-Buddhists, by those who engage in contentious speech, by those who enter the thicket of false views, by those who have gone down the wrong path, by those who are tƒ´rthikas, or by those who are worldly logicians.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la sred pa thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'i spyod yul yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la sred pa thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'i spyod yul yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not a domain that can be reached by those who crave nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'dus ma byas la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who abide in the unconditioned

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas na /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pas na /
translated: are conceptual in their nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: mya ngan las 'das bar rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de nyid du 'byed rnams su rnam par rtog pa yin pas so //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das bar rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de nyid du 'byed rnams su rnam par rtog pa yin pas so //
translated: The very conceptualization of nirvana is a conceptualization of the aggregates.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni /
translated: The realm of nirvana

original: rnam par rtog pa'i g-yo ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pas /üîΩ'dus ma byas kyang yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i g-yo ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pas / 'dus ma byas kyang yod pa ma yin na /
translated: is beyond all conceptual movement.üîΩIf even the unconditioned does not exist,

original: 'dus byas yod par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: 'dus byas yod par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: how could the conditioned exist?

original: lam 'di ni /
analyzed: lam 'di ni /
translated: This path

original: rnam par rtog pa thams @145b cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pas /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams @145b cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pas /
translated: purifies all conceptualization.

original: tha na 'dus ma byas su rtog pa cung zad tsam yang med na /
analyzed: tha na 'dus ma byas su rtog pa cung zad tsam yang med na /
translated: If even the slightest conceptualization of the unconditioned does not exist,

original: 'dus byas su rtog pa thams cad lta yod par ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: 'dus byas su rtog pa thams cad lta yod par ga la 'gyur /
translated: how could any conceptualization of the conditioned exist?

original: gang gis ji tsam du 'phags pa'i lam la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang gis ji tsam du 'phags pa'i lam la rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who conceptualize the noble path to any degree

original: 'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa zhes mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa zhes mi bya'o //
translated: are not abiding in the noble path.

original: gang gis rnam par rtog pa'i g-yo ba thams cad spengs pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: gang gis rnam par rtog pa'i g-yo ba thams cad spengs pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is the abandonment of all movements of conceptuality,üîΩ

original: 'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i lam la gnas pa dang / rab tu bde ba'i lam la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i lam la gnas pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i lam la gnas pa dang / rab tu bde ba'i lam la gnas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is the path of the noble ones, the path of fearlessness, the path of peace, and the path of happiness.

original: lam 'dis ni /
analyzed: lam 'dis ni /
translated: This path

original: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal med pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do //
analyzed: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal med pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do //
translated: leads to the state of no aging, sickness, death, sorrow, or suffering.

original: lam 'dis ni /üîΩngo bo nyid med par phyin par byed cing /
analyzed: lam 'dis ni / ngo bo nyid med par phyin par byed cing /
translated: This pathüîΩleads to the state of no intrinsic nature.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi gnas las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi gnas las yang dag par 'da' bar byed do //
translated: It leads beyond the domain of intrinsic nature.

original: lam 'dis ni /
analyzed: lam 'dis ni /
translated: This path

original: ngo bo nyid dang / ngo bo nyid ma yin pa thams cad spangs pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang / ngo bo nyid ma yin pa thams cad spangs pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do //
translated: leads to the state of the abandonment of all intrinsic natures and non-intrinsic natures.

original: lam 'dis ni /
analyzed: lam 'dis ni /
translated: This path

original: mtshan nyid bstan du med pa dang / gzugs can gyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bstan du med pa dang / gzugs can gyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i gnas su phyin par byed do //
translated: leads to the state of no characteristics to be shown and no characteristics of form.

original: lam 'dis ni /
analyzed: lam 'dis ni /
translated: This pathüîΩleads to the state of no characteristics to be shown and no characteristics of form.

original: nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du khyab pas bla na med pa'i gzhal med khang chen por phyin par byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du khyab pas bla na med pa'i gzhal med khang chen por phyin par byed do //
translated: It is like space, pervading everything, and so it brings one to the unsurpassed great palace.

original: de ltar song ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: de ltar song ba gang yin pa de dag ni /
translated: Those who have gone there

original: phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: will not turn back, and so they will attain various kinds of happiness.

original: gzhal med khang chen po de yang bstan du med cing dngos po'i mtshan @146a *//
analyzed: gzhal med khang chen po de yang bstan du med cing dngos po'i mtshan @146a *//
translated: That great palace is also not something that can be shown, and it has no characteristics of materiality.

original: ma ci yang med pas 'dus byas cung zad tsam yang med la /
analyzed: ma ci yang med pas 'dus byas cung zad tsam yang med la /
translated: It is not even the slightest thing that is conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas kyang cung zad tsam yang med de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyang cung zad tsam yang med de /
translated: It is also not even the slightest thing that is unconditioned.

original: 'dus byas bkag cing 'dus ma byas spangs pa yin pas /üîΩsems can rnams la 'dus byas kyi bde ba'am /
analyzed: 'dus byas bkag cing 'dus ma byas spangs pa yin pas / sems can rnams la 'dus byas kyi bde ba'am /
translated: Since it is the negation of the conditioned and the abandonment of the unconditioned,üîΩit does not give sentient beings any conditioned happiness

original: 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba gang yang sbyin par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi bde ba gang yang sbyin par mi byed do //
translated: or any unconditioned happiness.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: ji tsam du 'dus byas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa la mos pa de dag kyang 'dus byas kyi bde ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed na /
analyzed: ji tsam du 'dus byas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa la mos pa de dag kyang 'dus byas kyi bde ba yongs su tshol bar mi byed na /
translated: those who aspire to conditioned nirvƒÅ·πáa do not seek conditioned happiness,

original: gzhal med khang chen por zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: gzhal med khang chen por zhugs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: What need is there to mention entering the great palace?

original: gzhal med khang chen po de ni /
analyzed: gzhal med khang chen po de ni /
translated: That great palace

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rab tu bsil zhing dben par gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rab tu bsil zhing dben par gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
translated: is called nirvƒÅ·πáa because it is free from activity, is very cool, and is secluded.

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug 'gog pa dang / pag la nyal rnams spong ba dang / sred pa'i lta ba'i dra ba dral ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo bskams pa dang / zug rdug dug pa rtsad nas bton pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug 'gog pa dang / pag la nyal rnams spong ba dang / sred pa'i lta ba'i dra ba dral ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo bskams pa dang / zug rdug dug pa rtsad nas bton pa dang /
translated: It is called nirvƒÅ·πáa because it is the cessation of desire, anger, and ignorance, because it is the abandonment of the latent tendencies, because it is the unraveling of the net of the views of craving, because it is the drying up of the river of ignorance, because it is the uprooting of the thorn of suffering,

original: mi dge ba'i chos rnams zang pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos rnams zang pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
translated: and because it is the removal of nonvirtuous phenomena.

original: nga rgyal gyi nad dang / sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs pa thams cad thag bsrings pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal gyi nad dang / sdug bsngal mang pos nyon mongs pa thams cad thag bsrings pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called nirvƒÅ·πáa because it is far removed from the disease of pride and all the afflictions of suffering.

original: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir mya ngan 'das pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir mya ngan 'das pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called nirvƒÅ·πáa because it is not an object of mind, thought, or consciousness.

original: rtsod pa'i smra pa rnams dang / mtshams sbyor ba thams cad nas chos @146b kyi 'du shes kyi bar du nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i smra pa rnams dang / mtshams sbyor ba thams cad nas chos @146b kyi 'du shes kyi bar du nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called nirvƒÅ·πáa because it is the pacification of all the disputations of the proponents of views, up to the pacification of the perception of phenomena.

original: yid kyi mos pa rnams dang / yid kyi mos pa yongs su tshol ba gcod cing rnam par brtags pa dang / rnam par brtag par bya ba'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yid kyi mos pa rnams dang / yid kyi mos pa yongs su tshol ba gcod cing rnam par brtags pa dang / rnam par brtag par bya ba'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called nirvƒÅ·πáa because it is the absence of the signs of mental engagement, the investigation of mental engagement, and the investigation of the investigated.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: 'di ni / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin te /
translated: this is the essence of great nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la mtha' med pas brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la mtha' med pas brjod kyis mi lang ngo //
translated: Since nirvƒÅ·πáa is limitless, it is inexpressible.

original: gal te bgrod par bya ba dang bcas par gyur pa na /
analyzed: gal te bgrod par bya ba dang bcas par gyur pa na /
translated: If it were something to be traversed,

original: de ni / lam ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni / lam ma yin te /
translated: it would not be the path.

original: lam la yang tshig med pas brjod par mi nus so //
analyzed: lam la yang tshig med pas brjod par mi nus so //

analyzed: gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'di la yang dag par gzhol bar gyur pa na /
translated: when bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattvas correctly engage in this path,

analyzed: yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i phyir chos gcig mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: in order to gather the eightfold noble path, they accomplish one teaching:

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos rnams mi byed pa gang yin pa'o //
