original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu pa'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu pa'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Furthermore, in order to gather the eightfold noble path, they accomplish two kinds of teachings:

original: nang du dge pa'i chos gang yin zhes tshul bzhin du sems pa dang / phyi rol tu dge ba'i chos rnams gang yin zhes tshul bzhin du 'dri bar byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: nang du dge pa'i chos gang yin zhes tshul bzhin du sems pa dang / phyi rol tu dge ba'i chos rnams gang yin zhes tshul bzhin du 'dri bar byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the proper reflection on what is virtuous within, and the proper inquiry into what is virtuous without.

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Moreover, in order to gather the eightfold noble path, one accomplishes two kinds of Dharma:

original: dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams rtogs par @150b khong du chud pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par khong du chud pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams rtogs par @150b khong du chud pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med par khong du chud pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: the realization of things as they are, and the realization of non-entity and non-conceptuality.

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Moreover, in order to gather the eightfold noble path, one accomplishes two kinds of Dharma:

original: nang du rtogs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / phyi rol tu mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: nang du rtogs pa'i rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / phyi rol tu mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: the pursuit of inner realization and the absence of external attachment.

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /üîΩrnam par rtog par bya ba med par bdag nyid mngon par yid ches pa dang / sems can gang da dung mngon par yid ches par ma gyur pa de dag bdag gis lam 'di la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de / rnam par rtog par bya ba med par bdag nyid mngon par yid ches pa dang / sems can gang da dung mngon par yid ches par ma gyur pa de dag bdag gis lam 'di la dgod par bya'o //
translated: Furthermore, in order to gather the eightfold noble path, one accomplishes two dharmas:

original: snyam du sems pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: snyam du sems pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: one has confidence in oneself without conceptualization, and one thinks, ‚ÄúI will establish on this path those sentient beings who have not yet gained confidence.‚Äù

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gnyis mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Furthermore, in order to gather the eightfold noble path, one accomplishes two dharmas:

original: lus su bya ba rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong ba dang / lus su bya ba rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: lus su bya ba rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong ba dang / lus su bya ba rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: one sees and knows correctly the activities of the body, and one has no attachment to the activities of the body.

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Furthermore, in order to gather the eightfold noble path, they accomplish three kinds of teachings.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po sdug bsngal dang bcas pa rnams re re nas rtogs par khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar len pa'i phung po'i sdug bsngal @151a *//
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po sdug bsngal dang bcas pa rnams re re nas rtogs par khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar len pa'i phung po'i sdug bsngal @151a *//
translated: They understand the individual aggregates that are appropriated and their suffering, and they strive to seek and aspire to the aggregates that are appropriated and their absence of suffering.

original: med pa rnams nan tan gyis yongs su tshol zhing mos par byed pa dang / 'dus pa'i chos rnams yongs su spong bar brtson pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: med pa rnams nan tan gyis yongs su tshol zhing mos par byed pa dang / 'dus pa'i chos rnams yongs su spong bar brtson pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: They strive to abandon the phenomena of accumulation.

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Furthermore, in order to gather the eightfold noble path, they accomplish three kinds of teachings.

original: chos mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par ston pa na tshig 'gal ba med par chos kyi don rjes su mthun par ston cing /
analyzed: chos mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par ston pa na tshig 'gal ba med par chos kyi don rjes su mthun par ston cing /
translated: When they teach the supreme Dharma, they teach the meaning of the Dharma in a way that is consistent with the words, without contradiction.

original: sems la rtsod pa med pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / yi ge thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: sems la rtsod pa med pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / yi ge thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of dispute in the mind, the absence of attachment to all words and letters, and the gathering together of all the Dharmas.

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa bzhi mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa bzhi mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Moreover, in order to gather together the eightfold noble path, one accomplishes four Dharmas.

original: don la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / don ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun par so sor rtog pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang /
analyzed: don la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / don ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su mthun par yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang / chos kyi rjes su mthun par so sor rtog pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the thing that is correctly applied to the meaning, the accomplishment of the thing that is correctly applied in accordance with the meaning, the accomplishment of the thing that is correctly applied to the discernment that is in accordance with the Dharma,

original: thams cad la yang mngon par zhen pa mi skyed par yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad la yang mngon par zhen pa mi skyed par yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: and the accomplishment of the thing that is correctly applied without generating attachment to anything.

original: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su @151b bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa bzhi mngon par sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su @151b bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa bzhi mngon par sgrub par byed de /
translated: Furthermore, in order to fully include the eightfold path of noble ones, they accomplish four kinds of qualities.

original: shin tu brtan pa'i yi dam gyis bdag nyid bsrung zhing ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin du sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang po drug la mkhas shing lam la gzhol bar byed pa dang / bsam pa rnam par dag par byed pa dang /
analyzed: shin tu brtan pa'i yi dam gyis bdag nyid bsrung zhing ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin du sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang po drug la mkhas shing lam la gzhol bar byed pa dang / bsam pa rnam par dag par byed pa dang /
translated: They protect themselves with very firm commitments and accomplish exactly what has been taught; they are skilled in the six senses and apply themselves to the path; they purify their intentions;

original: bag yod pa la gnas par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: bag yod pa la gnas par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: and they abide in carefulness.

original: blo gros mtha' yas; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: Anantamati, bodhisattva great beings

original: chos kyi spyod pa 'dis lam yongs su sdud par byed pa'i phyir lam gyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi spyod pa 'dis lam yongs su sdud par byed pa'i phyir lam gyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste /
translated: are called ‚Äúfollowers of the path‚Äù because this Dharma conduct gathers the path.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba'i phyir dang / ming med pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba'i phyir dang / ming med pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir dang / skye ba med pa'i phyir dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang /
translated: Because all phenomena are seen to be empty by nature, because they are nameless, because they are signless, because they are wishless, because they are unborn, because they are unconditioned,

original: yongs su skyo bar gyur pa'i phyir dang / spangs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa'i phyir dang / nges par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi snang ba thob pa yin no; ;skye ba rnams zad par so sor rtog pa na yang skye ba med pa la yang skye ba'i 'du shes skyed par mi byed pas /
analyzed: yongs su skyo bar gyur pa'i phyir dang / spangs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / 'gag pa'i phyir dang / nges par 'gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi snang ba thob pa yin no; ;skye ba rnams zad par so sor rtog pa na yang skye ba med pa la yang skye ba'i 'du shes skyed par mi byed pas /
translated: because they are utterly exhausted, because they are relinquished, because they cease, and because they are certain, they attain the illumination of Dharma. When they discern the exhaustion of births, they do not give rise to the notion of birth even in the absence of birth.

original: de'i tshe skye ba las yang dag par 'das nas chos ma yin pa las nges par byung ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i lam thob nas mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe skye ba las yang dag par 'das nas chos ma yin pa las nges par byung ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i lam thob nas mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, having transcended birth, they attain the acceptance of non-arising, having emerged from non-Dharma and attained the pure path.‚Äù

original: lam rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir 'du shes thams cad las @152a *//
analyzed: lam rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir 'du shes thams cad las @152a *//
translated: Because the path is purified, they transcend all notions.

original: yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med pa la mi gnas pa dang / lam gyi 'du shes bkag nas chos kyi 'du shes spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i dra ba las nges par 'byung zhing rig pas sgom pas 'thob par bya ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med pa la mi gnas pa dang / lam gyi 'du shes bkag nas chos kyi 'du shes spong ba dang / ma rig pa'i dra ba las nges par 'byung zhing rig pas sgom pas 'thob par bya ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not abide in the absence of notions, they block the notion of the path and abandon the notion of phenomena, they emerge from the net of ignorance, and they attain the Dharma that is to be attained through the cultivation of knowledge.

original: rig pas sgom pas chos gang zhig thob par 'gyur zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rig pas sgom pas chos gang zhig thob par 'gyur zhe na; 'di lta ste /
translated: What Dharma is attained through the cultivation of knowledge?

original: rig pas sgom pas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa thob pa dang / chos thams cad la nges par mkhas pa thob pa dang / gsang ste gsungs pa rtog pas chos nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rig pas sgom pas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa thob pa dang / chos thams cad la nges par mkhas pa thob pa dang / gsang ste gsungs pa rtog pas chos nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is the attainment of the cessation of notions and feelings through the cultivation of knowledge, the attainment of expertise in all phenomena, and the attainment of following the nature of the secret teachings through knowledge.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'dir zhugs par gyur pa'i tshe yul la mi gnas shing mtshan mas bsgribs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lam 'dir zhugs par gyur pa'i tshe yul la mi gnas shing mtshan mas bsgribs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: When the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas enter this path, they do not dwell on objects and are not obscured by signs.

original: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / skye ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / skye ba'i ngo bo nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par shes pas mtshan ma cung zad tsam gyis kyang bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ltar yang dag par zhugs shing gzhol bar gyur pa'i tshe dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / rnam par thar pa dang /

original: ting nge 'dzin dang // snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong tshad med pa rnams yang dag par khong du chud pas yon tan khyad par 'phags pa tshad med pas brgyan nas 'jig rten pa rnams rab tu gdul ba'i phyir dang /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang // snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong tshad med pa rnams yang dag par khong du chud pas yon tan khyad par 'phags pa tshad med pas brgyan nas 'jig rten pa rnams rab tu gdul ba'i phyir dang /
translated: Adorned with immeasurable, exalted qualities, they will tame worldly beings.

analyzed: go cha bgos nas khams gsum las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / theg pa chen po la zhon @155b nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin rnams yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir lam 'di la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par gzhol bar byed do //
translated: Having donned the armor, they abide on this path in order to attain unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in order to liberate the three realms, and in order to uphold gods, humans, and asuras.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /

analyzed: go cha chen po bgos te theg pa chen po la zhon nas lam 'di la gnas pa'i tshe gal te byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis sems can kun la khyab par byed dam /
translated: having donned the great armor and mounted the Great Vehicle, abide on this path. If they do not pervade all beings with love, compassion, joy, and equanimity,

analyzed: sems can rnams la bdag dang 'dra bar phangs par mi byed na ni /

analyzed: de lta bu'i go cha dang / theg pa chen po'i lam tshan po 'di dag ni /

analyzed: sa chen po kyang theg par mi 'gyur la /

original: 'di ltar sems can rnams la snying brtse zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te theg pa chen po la zhon nas lam 'di la gnas pa yin pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can rnams la snying brtse zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te theg pa chen po la zhon nas lam 'di la gnas pa yin pas /
translated: However, in order to have compassion for sentient beings and to benefit them, they don the great armor, mount the Great Vehicle, and abide on this path.

original: go cha dang / theg pa chen po'i lam chen po 'di dag tu lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang bgrod par mi nus la /

translated: Therefore, the entire world with its gods, humans, and asuras is unable to traverse these great armor and the great path of the Great Vehicle.

original: byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig rten la mngon par zhan pa dang / 'jig rten na gnas par mos pa thams cad kyis kyang mthong bar mi nus pa yin no //üîΩgzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig rten la mngon par zhan pa dang / 'jig rten na gnas par mos pa thams cad kyis kyang mthong bar mi nus pa yin no // gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: And all childish ordinary beings who are attached to the world and aspire to remain in the world are unable to see it.

original: sems @156a *// can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas /
analyzed: sems @156a *// can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas /
translated: Moreover, bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas don the great armor out of compassion for all sentient beings.

original: 'di ltar go cha'i mthus sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams rnams byin gyis brlabs pas /
analyzed: 'di ltar go cha'i mthus sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams rnams byin gyis brlabs pas /
translated: In this way, through the power of the armor, the elements of earth, water, fire, and wind are blessed.

original: sa'i khams 'di g-yo zhing 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa mi skye ba dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnams kyang de dag gi rjes su ci rigs par bya ba rnams byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams 'di g-yo zhing 'khrug pa med pa dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa mi skye ba dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rnams kyang de dag gi rjes su ci rigs par bya ba rnams byed pa yin no //
translated: Because of this, the earth element does not tremble or quake, all sentient beings do not experience fear, and the water element, the fire element, and the wind element also perform their functions in accordance with what is appropriate.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang po sems bskyed de go cha bgos nas deng go cha chen po 'di bgos te theg pa chen po 'di la zhon nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gzhol zhing byang chub
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang po sems bskyed de go cha bgos nas deng go cha chen po 'di bgos te theg pa chen po 'di la zhon nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gzhol zhing byang chub
translated: Moreover, the great bodhisattvas, having first generated the mind of awakening and donned the armor, now don this great armor and, having mounted this Great Vehicle, apply themselves to the stage of being impeded by only one birth through the path of purity and

original: kyi shing drung du bgrod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs par gyur gyi bar du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje las mngon par grub pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor shin tu brtan pa 'di gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na /

translated: and when he has gone to the foot of the Bodhi tree and has entered the site of enlightenment, if he does not bless this great billion-world universe,

original: 'khrug cing g-yo bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'khrug cing g-yo bar 'gyur te /
translated: this solid diamond-hard surface of the earth will tremble and shake.

original: shin tu brtan pa'i rdo rje las mngon par 'gyur pa yin yang go cha chen po dang / theg pa chen po'i lam chen po 'di 'degs pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shin tu brtan pa'i rdo rje las mngon par 'gyur pa yin yang go cha chen po dang / theg pa chen po'i lam chen po 'di 'degs pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though it is made of solid diamond, it will not be worthy to bear the great armor and the great path of the Great Vehicle.

translated: Furthermore, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas, through their previous aspirations, generate love and great compassion for sentient beings, and praise the buddhas and bodhisattvas of the ten directions. If they do not bless the great vajra ma·πá·∏çala,

analyzed: go cha chen po dang / theg pa chen po'i lam chen po 'di dag 'degs pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro //

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: Furthermore, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas,

original: sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i phyir dang / gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir dang / mnyam par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i phyir dang / gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir dang / mnyam par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /

analyzed: skrag par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / 'khon du mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / mnar bar mi byed pa'i phyir dang / nyon mongs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam 'di la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar byed do //
translated: because of their non-fear, because of their non-resentment, because of their non-torment, because of their non-affliction, and because of their wish to bring happiness to beings, they don the great armor, mount the Great Vehicle, abide on this path, and apply themselves to unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings

original: go cha bgos pa na shes rab kyi @157a *//
analyzed: go cha bgos pa na shes rab kyi @157a *//
translated: When he dons the armor, he dons the armor of wisdom.

original: go cha bgos nas shes rab kyi mtshon cha thogs te shes rab chen pos yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
analyzed: go cha bgos nas shes rab kyi mtshon cha thogs te shes rab chen pos yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
translated: Having donned the armor, he takes up the weapon of wisdom. With great wisdom he makes a dedication.

original: yongs su bsngo ba'i theg pa la zhon nas shes rab kyi snang ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba'i theg pa la zhon nas shes rab kyi snang ba skyed par byed do //
translated: Having mounted the vehicle of dedication, he produces the light of wisdom.

original: snang ba'i lam la gnas nas shes rab kyi snang ba'i mig gis chos rnams so sor brtags te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol bar byed do //
analyzed: snang ba'i lam la gnas nas shes rab kyi snang ba'i mig gis chos rnams so sor brtags te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol bar byed do //
translated: Having stood on the path of light, he examines phenomena with the eye of the light of wisdom and turns to the wisdom of omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / sems can rnams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: For the sake of the wisdom of omniscience and for the sake of gathering beings, he practices the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of generosity, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of effort, and the perfection of meditation.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed do //
translated: the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: thams cad kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro zhing shes rab kyis mngon par sgrub pa dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
analyzed: thams cad kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro zhing shes rab kyis mngon par sgrub pa dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
translated: All of them are preceded by wisdom, accomplished by wisdom, and gathered by wisdom, and they are dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva Anantamati said to the BhagavƒÅn,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‚ÄúBhagavƒÅn,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad du khyab cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad du khyab cing /
translated: the various kinds of wisdom of the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas pervade everywhere

original: sangs @157b rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa rnams yongs su sdud cing mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa ni /
analyzed: sangs @157b rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa rnams yongs su sdud cing mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa ni /
translated: and gather and accomplish the immeasurable qualities of the buddhas.

original: shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so //
analyzed: shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so //
translated: This is truly most wondrous.‚Äù

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Buddha then said to the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva Anantamati,

original: blo gros mtha' yas /üîΩde de bzhin no //
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas / de de bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúAnantamati,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so, it is so.üîΩIt is just as you have said.

original: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
analyzed: khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni /
translated: Bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas

original: shes rab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du khyab cing /
analyzed: shes rab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du khyab cing /
translated: are pervaded by various kinds of wisdom.

original: chos thams cad yongs su bsdus te go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam chen po 'di la gnas nas thams cad kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro bas rab tu gzhol bar byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad yongs su bsdus te go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te lam chen po 'di la gnas nas thams cad kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro bas rab tu gzhol bar byed do //
translated: Having gathered all phenomena and donned the great armor, they mount the Great Vehicle and, abiding on this great path, they all proceed by means of wisdom.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: Anantamati,

original: gal te shes rab dang ldan pa yang shes rab sngon du 'gro ba med na /
analyzed: gal te shes rab dang ldan pa yang shes rab sngon du 'gro ba med na /
translated: if those endowed with wisdom were not preceded by wisdom,

original: lam 'di la rab tu gzhol bar mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: lam 'di la rab tu gzhol bar mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: they would not proceed on this path.

original: gal te shes rab dang ldan zhing shes rab sngon du 'gro bas thams cad du khyab bar 'gyur nas rjes su 'jug pa dang / rjes su sgyod pa dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsdus shing shes rab kyis rab tu bsngams par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te shes rab dang ldan zhing shes rab sngon du 'gro bas thams cad du khyab bar 'gyur nas rjes su 'jug pa dang / rjes su sgyod pa dang / shes rab kyis yongs su bsdus shing shes rab kyis rab tu bsngams par gyur na /
translated: If one is endowed with wisdom, and if wisdom precedes and pervades everything, and if one is engaged in, engaged in imitating, and engaged in gathering wisdom, and if one is engaged in binding with wisdom,

original: gdod go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa dang lam chen po 'di la gnas pa zhes bste /
analyzed: gdod go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon pa dang lam chen po 'di la gnas pa zhes bste /
translated: then one is said to have donned the great armor, to have mounted the Great Vehicle, and to abide on this great path.

original: rab tu bde ba'i chos kyis 'jig rten la phan 'dogs shing shes rab kyi mig 'byed par byed do //
analyzed: rab tu bde ba'i chos kyis 'jig rten la phan 'dogs shing shes rab kyi mig 'byed par byed do //
translated: One benefits the world with the Dharma of great bliss and opens the eye of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi mig gis so sor @158a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi mig gis so sor @158a *//
translated: Having opened the eye of wisdom,

translated: one should examine with the eye of wisdom. Having clarified the body of wisdom, one should emit great light rays and be dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: blo gros mtha' yas /

analyzed: sems can nad ni bsal ba'i phyir // theg pa dag gis gzhol bar bya //
translated: In order to eliminate the sickness of sentient beings,üîΩThey apply themselves to the vehicles.

original: lam mchog dag ni phun tshogs pa //
analyzed: lam mchog dag ni phun tshogs pa //
translated: They perfect the supreme path

original: bla med mchog tu sbyor bas na //
analyzed: bla med mchog tu sbyor bas na //
translated: And apply themselves to the unsurpassed supreme.üîΩThey do not harm, do not hold grudges,

original: mi 'tshe 'khon 'dzin med pa dang // gnod pa mi byed yang dag gnas //üîΩshes rab chen po'i go bgos te //
analyzed: mi 'tshe 'khon 'dzin med pa dang // gnod pa mi byed yang dag gnas // shes rab chen po'i go bgos te //
translated: And do not cause harm, but abide correctly.üîΩThey don the armor of great wisdom

original: shes rab bsngo ba'i theg zhon pa //
analyzed: shes rab bsngo ba'i theg zhon pa //
translated: And ride the vehicle of wisdom and dedication.

original: go cha 'dzin par mi 'gyur bas //
analyzed: go cha 'dzin par mi 'gyur bas //
translated: They do not grasp at the armor

original: bsngo ba'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: bsngo ba'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: And become supreme among those who dedicate.

original: byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed pas //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed pas //
translated: The bodhisattvas who are protectors

original: shes rab snang ba la gnas te //
analyzed: shes rab snang ba la gnas te //
translated: Abide in the light of wisdom

original: shes rab chos rnams rab brtags nas //
analyzed: shes rab chos rnams rab brtags nas //
translated: And, having examined phenomena with wisdom,

original: bla na med par gzhol bar byed //
analyzed: bla na med par gzhol bar byed //
translated: Apply themselves to the unsurpassed.üîΩThe supreme path of the bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mchog dang // go cha dang ni theg chen dag /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam mchog dang // go cha dang ni theg chen dag /
translated: The armor and the Great Vehicle

original: shes rab 'od las byung bas na //
analyzed: shes rab 'od las byung bas na //
translated: Arise from the light of wisdom.

original: de phyir sems ni rnam par dag /
analyzed: de phyir sems ni rnam par dag /
translated: Therefore, the mind is completely pure.

original: pha rol phyin la rab zhon nas //
analyzed: pha rol phyin la rab zhon nas //
translated: Having mounted the perfections,

original: byang chub chen @161a *//
analyzed: byang chub chen @161a *//
translated: The great enlightenment

original: por bgrod byed cing //
analyzed: por bgrod byed cing //
translated: And they proceed to the other side.

original: shes rab yongs sdud shes rab gtsang //
analyzed: shes rab yongs sdud shes rab gtsang //
translated: Wisdom is the collector, wisdom is the purifier,

original: shes rab dag ni sngon du 'gro //
analyzed: shes rab dag ni sngon du 'gro //
translated: Wisdom is the forerunner.

original: pha rol phyin pa thams cad kyi //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa thams cad kyi //
translated: Of all the perfections,

original: shes rab 'di ni sngon du 'gro /
analyzed: shes rab 'di ni sngon du 'gro /
translated: Wisdom is the forerunner.

original: shes rab yongs sdud shes rab gtsang //
analyzed: shes rab yongs sdud shes rab gtsang //
translated: Wisdom is the collector, wisdom is the purifier,

original: bla med ye shes len par byed //
analyzed: bla med ye shes len par byed //
translated: It takes up unsurpassed wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bsam mi khyab //
translated: The bodhisattvas are inconceivable,

original: shes rab snang ba skyed byed cing //
analyzed: shes rab snang ba skyed byed cing //
translated: They give rise to the light of wisdom,

original: shes rab sgron chen sbar byed pas //
analyzed: shes rab sgron chen sbar byed pas //
translated: They light the great lamp of wisdom,

original: bde bar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur //üîΩshes rab snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bde bar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur // shes rab snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
translated: And thus they proceed to bliss.üîΩIn order to give rise to the light of wisdom,

original: des na shes rab mig kyang 'byed //
analyzed: des na shes rab mig kyang 'byed //
translated: They open the eye of wisdom.üîΩThey clearly see and proceed to

original: sangs rgyas bla med ye shes dag /üîΩgsal mthong rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bla med ye shes dag / gsal mthong rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur //
translated: The unsurpassed wisdom of the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dag /üîΩgo cha dpag tu med pa yis //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dag / go cha dpag tu med pa yis //
translated: The bodhisattva heroesüîΩWith immeasurable armor

original: tshad med par ni brgyan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: tshad med par ni brgyan pa'i phyir //
translated: Adorn themselves immeasurably,

original: go cha bgos pa zhes bya 'o //
analyzed: go cha bgos pa zhes bya 'o //
translated: Thus they are called ‚Äúthe armored ones.‚Äù

original: byang chub sems dpa' blo chen dag /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' blo chen dag /
translated: The bodhisattvas with great minds

original: theg chen rab tu brgyan pas na //
analyzed: theg chen rab tu brgyan pas na //
translated: And the great vehicle is fully adorned.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa la //
translated: They are dedicated to the omniscience of the buddhas,

original: gos pa med par gzhol bar byed //
analyzed: gos pa med par gzhol bar byed //
translated: Which is free from any obscurations.

original: byang chub sems dpa' blo chen dag /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' blo chen dag /
translated: The bodhisattvas, the great beings,

original: lam chen rab tu brgyan pas na //üîΩbsam gyis mi khyab mchog dag la //
analyzed: lam chen rab tu brgyan pas na // bsam gyis mi khyab mchog dag la //
translated: Adorn the great pathüîΩAnd are dedicated to the supreme, inconceivable

original: rnam par dag pas gzhol bar byed //
analyzed: rnam par dag pas gzhol bar byed //
translated: Purity.

original: bam po bzhi pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi pa /
translated: Chapter Four

original: gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas /
analyzed: gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas /
translated: Furthermore, Anantamati,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang / lam @161b chen po'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dag la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang / lam @161b chen po'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dag la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings should be dedicated to the immeasurable sphere of armor, the immeasurable sphere of the Great Vehicle, and the immeasurable sphere of the great path.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it will lead to everything.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni //
translated: The bodhisattva great beings

original: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar byed do //üîΩchos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la zhon par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar byed do // chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la zhon par byed do //
translated: They don the great armor because they want to engage with all phenomena.üîΩThey mount the Great Vehicle because they want to engage with all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir lam chen po la rab tu gnas par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir lam chen po la rab tu gnas par byed do //
translated: They set out on the great path because they want to engage with all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir rab tu gzhol bar byed do //üîΩ'on kyang go cha des chos cung zad tsam yang nang ngam /
analyzed: chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir rab tu gzhol bar byed do // 'on kyang go cha des chos cung zad tsam yang nang ngam /
translated: They set out in order to attain the sameness of all phenomena.

original: phyi rol lam /
analyzed: phyi rol lam /
translated: However, because of that armor, they do not apprehend any phenomenon, whether internal or external,

original: rags pa'am / phra ba'am /
analyzed: rags pa'am / phra ba'am /
translated: gross or subtle,

original: thag ring ba'am /üîΩthag nye ba'am /üîΩ'das pa'am / da ltar gyur pa'am /
analyzed: thag ring ba'am / thag nye ba'am / 'das pa'am / da ltar gyur pa'am /
translated: far or near,

original: ma 'ongs pa'am /üîΩ'dus byas sam /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'am / 'dus byas sam /
translated: past, future, or present,

original: 'dus ma byas sam /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas sam /
translated: conditioned or unconditioned,

original: gnas pa'am / mi gnas pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gnas pa'am / mi gnas pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi dmigs so //
translated: or whether it is a phenomenon that abides or does not abide.

original: gal te go cha 'dis chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed mi nus sam //
analyzed: gal te go cha 'dis chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed mi nus sam //
translated: If this armor cannot fully discriminate all phenomena,

original: gtan la 'bebs par mi nus sam /
analyzed: gtan la 'bebs par mi nus sam /
translated: cannot bring them to an end,

original: yongs su mi shes sam /
analyzed: yongs su mi shes sam /
translated: cannot understand them,

original: rjes su 'jug par mi nus sam /
analyzed: rjes su 'jug par mi nus sam /
translated: cannot engage with them,

original: mngon sum du byed mi nus sam; yang dag par 'da' bar mi nus na /
analyzed: mngon sum du byed mi nus sam; yang dag par 'da' bar mi nus na /
translated: cannot actualize them, and cannot transcend them,

original: go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya'o //
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos pa zhes mi bya'o //
translated: then it is not called the great armor.

original: chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed dam /
analyzed: chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed dam /
translated: If it can fully discriminate all phenomena,

original: gtan la 'bebs sam /
analyzed: gtan la 'bebs sam /
translated: bring them to an end,

original: yongs su shes @162a *//üîΩbar gyur tam /
analyzed: yongs su shes @162a *// bar gyur tam /
translated: understand them,

original: rjes su 'jug par byed dam /üîΩmngon sum du byed dam /
analyzed: rjes su 'jug par byed dam / mngon sum du byed dam /
translated: engage with them,

original: yang dag par 'da' bar byed na /
analyzed: yang dag par 'da' bar byed na /
translated: actualize them, and transcend them,

original: go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o //üîΩtheg pa chen po des kyang chos 'ga' tsam yang nang ngam /
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o // theg pa chen po des kyang chos 'ga' tsam yang nang ngam /
translated: then it is called the great armor.

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsngo ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs shing /
translated: And through this Great Vehicle, not even a single phenomenon is truly apprehended, from the inner to the outer, up to the dedication to the wisdom of omniscience.

original: yongs su shes pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa dang / yang dag par 'da' bar byed pas de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni /
analyzed: yongs su shes pa dang / rjes su 'jug pa dang / mngon sum du byed pa dang / yang dag par 'da' bar byed pas de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni /
translated: It is the vehicle of complete understanding, engagement, direct realization, and perfect transcendence.

original: theg pa chen po dang / chos la rab tu mkhas pa'i theg pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par phyin par byed pa'i theg pa dang / gong na med pa'i theg pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po dang / chos la rab tu mkhas pa'i theg pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par phyin par byed pa'i theg pa dang / gong na med pa'i theg pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, this vehicle is called the Great Vehicle, the vehicle of skill in phenomena, the vehicle that brings one to the transcendence of suffering, the unsurpassed vehicle, and the unequaled vehicle.

original: lam chen po des kyang cung zad tsam yang nang ngam phyi rol zhes bya ba nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi lam chen por gyur nas gzhol bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: lam chen po des kyang cung zad tsam yang nang ngam phyi rol zhes bya ba nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi lam chen por gyur nas gzhol bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs shing /
translated: This great path does not in the slightest way apprehend anything as inner or outer, and so forth, up to all phenomena becoming the great path of equality, which is inclined.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi lam 'dis chos 'ga' tsam yang yongs su mi shes pa med pas /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi lam 'dis chos 'ga' tsam yang yongs su mi shes pa med pas /
translated: There is nothing that is not completely understood through this path of equality.

original: de'i phyir lam 'di ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir lam 'di ni /
translated: Therefore, this path is called

original: bla na med pa'i lam dang / grangs dang / tshad med pa'i lam dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i lam dang / grangs dang / tshad med pa'i lam dang / mtshungs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the unsurpassed path, the path of numberlessness, the path of signlessness, and the path of wishlessness.
